item.title: SpringOne Platform 2019
item.description: Pivotal organized another SpringOne conference this year, and the ITQ Cloud Native team hopped across the large pond into the Texes heat to attend. Spring for the .net dev While Spring is a Java thing, SteelToe is there for us .net folks. It’s getting a big shot of TLC with a new website and new and improved docs! Creating microservices using .net got a bit easier than it already was with some new stuff such as actuators and service connectors.
